de:
Located in the small flowerd village of Tamniés in the heart of Black Perigord (close to the most touristic places of Sarlat, Les Eyzies and Montignac-Lascaux), the rooms are either close to the restaurant or on the edge of a natural park with a view on the warmed swimming pool, spa and sauna, with a beautiful surrounding on the countryside, an ideal place to rest.
The restaurant and the hotel have belonged to the same family since five generations, they will be happy to welcome you and make you paste the local specialities such as Fried foie gras, “Brouillade aux Truffes” scrambled eggs with Truffles and walnuts ice scream.
Nearby: lac, peach, leisure center, tennis and riding.
Private and free parking and wifi access.
en:
Located in the small flowerd village of Tamniés in the heart of Black Perigord (close to the most touristic places of Sarlat, Les Eyzies and Montignac-Lascaux), the rooms are either close to the restaurant or on the edge of a natural park with a view on the warmed swimming pool, spa and sauna, with a beautiful surrounding on the countryside, an ideal place to rest.
The restaurant and the hotel have belonged to the same family since five generations, they will be happy to welcome you and make you paste the local specialities such as Fried foie gras, “Brouillade aux Truffes” scrambled eggs with Truffles and walnuts ice scream.
Nearby: lac, peach, leisure center, tennis and riding.
Private and free parking and wifi access.
it:
L'hotel si trova nel piccolo villaggio fiorito di Tamniés, nel cuore del Périgord Noir (a breve distanza da Sarlat, Les Eyzies e Montignac-Lascaux). La nostra struttura comprende diverse categorie di camere, alcune "lato hotel" con il ristorante e la reception nel cuore del villaggio, altre "lato parco" in mezzo alla natura con una piscina riscaldata a 28°C, area relax privata a pagamento, con una bella vista sulla valle delle Beune e sulla campagna circostante, dove calma e relax sono garantiti.
È in un'atmosfera familiare che potrete scoprire nel nostro ristorante le specialità della Périgourdine come il foie gras in padella, la Brouillade aux Truffes e il Soufflé glacé aux noix.
Nelle vicinanze: laghetto, pesca, centro ricreativo, tennis ed equitazione.
Parcheggio privato e wifi gratuito.
fr:
L'hôtel est situé dans le petit village fleuri de Tamniés, au coeur du Périgord Noir (égale distance de Sarlat, Les Eyzies et Montignac-Lascaux). Notre établissement comprend plusieurs catégories de chambres, les unes «côté Hôtel» avec le restaurant et la réception au cœur du village, les autres «côté Parc» en pleine nature avec piscine chauffée à 28°C, Espace détente privatif payant, avec une jolie vue sur la vallée de la Beune et de la campagne environnante où calme et détente sont garantis.
C’est dans une ambiance familiale que vous pourrez découvrir dans notre restaurant, nos spécialités périgourdines telles que le foie gras poêlé, la Brouillade aux Truffes et le Soufflé glacé aux noix.
A proximité : étang, pêche, base de loisirs, tennis et équitation.
Parking privé et wifi gratuit.

Located in the small flowerd village of Tamniés in the heart of Black Perigord (close to the most touristic places of Sarlat, Les Eyzies and Montignac-Lascaux), the rooms are either close to the restaurant or on the edge of a natural park with a view on the warmed swimming pool, spa and sauna, with a beautiful surrounding on the countryside, an ideal place to rest.
The restaurant and the hotel have belonged to the same family since five generations, they will be happy to welcome you and make you paste the local specialities such as Fried foie gras, “Brouillade aux Truffes” scrambled eggs with Truffles and walnuts ice scream.
Nearby: lac, peach, leisure center, tennis and riding.
Private and free parking and wifi access.

Private and free parking and wifi access.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme Sarlat Périgord Noir

de: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.

de:
